subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: A shot by the Blackhawks’ Michal Rozsival hit Andrew Shaw’s knee and sailed past Boston goalie Tuukka Rask at 12:08 of the third overtime.
snippet: A shot by the Blackhawks’ Michal Rozsival hit Andrew Shaw’s knee and sailed past Boston goalie Tuukka Rask at 12:08 of the third overtime.
